name: eG Enterprise
description:
eG Enterprise is an end-to-end performance management solution for Nutanix hyper-converged infrastructure. Using correlative intelligence and machine learning, eG Enterprise understands the interdependencies between the Nutanix platform and application workloads, helping IT identify the root cause of performance slowdowns.  
##### Features: 
* Measure the performance of the Nutanix platform and applications (Citrix/VDI, SAP, SharePoint, Exchange, Oracle, Java, etc.)   
* Monitor multi-hypervisor environments including Nutanix Acropolis, VMware vSphere, Microsoft Hyper-V, and Citrix XenServer 
* Track performance trends, forecast capacity needs and get actionable insights for scaling and resource expansion 
#### License:
* [Request 15 day Trial](https://www.eginnovations.com/product/trial-request)
#### Hardware Requirement:
* By default one VM, with 2 vCPU, 4GB RAM
#### Supported Operating System
* Windows Server 2012 R2
* Windows Server 2016
#### Platform:
* AHV
#### Support Information:
* Email: support@eginnovations.com
* USA (866) 526 6700
* India +91 44 4263 9553
author: Nutanix
